item.title: Kym add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "People think that a liar gains a victory over his victim. What I’ve learned is that a lie is an act of self-abdication, because one surrenders one’s reality to the person to whom one lies, making that person one’s master, condemning oneself from then on to faking the sort of reality that person’s view requires to be faked…The man who lies to the world, is the world’s slave from then on…There are no white lies, there is only the blackest of destruction, and a white lie is the blackest of all." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Kym add a quote by Criss Jami
item.description: "Just because something isn't a lie does not mean that it isn't deceptive. A liar knows that he is a liar, but one who speaks mere portions of truth in order to deceive is a craftsman of destruction." -- Criss Jami

item.title: Kym add a quote by Jeanne Birdsall
item.description:
"...even a tiny bit of deceit is dishonorable when it's used for selfish or cowardly reasons.
- Mr. Penderwick" -- Jeanne Birdsall

item.title: Kym add a quote by Thomas Hardy
item.description: "At first I did not love you, Jude; that I own. When I first knew you I merely wanted you to love me. I did not exactly flirt with you; but that inborn craving which undermines some women's morals almost more than unbridled passion--the craving to attract and captivate, regardless of the injury it may do the man--was in me; and when I found I had caught you, I was frightened. And then--I don't know how it was-- I couldn't bear to let you go--possibly to Arabella again--and so I got to love you, Jude. But you see, however fondly it ended, it began in the selfish and cruel wish to make your heart ache for me without letting mine ache for you." -- Thomas Hardy

item.title: Kym add a quote by Toba Beta
item.description: "There's a very thin difference between lying and breaking the promise." -- Toba Beta

item.title: Kym add a quote by Ravindra Shukla
item.description: "Talking is not easy. Talking intends to convey what you mean. Lying is easy, not talking. When one lies, one does not care, and that’s the easy part." -- Ravindra Shukla

item.title: Kym add a quote by Viktor E. Frankl
item.description: "When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves." -- Viktor E. Frankl
